name: BubbleShip PANIC!
description:
BubbleShip PANIC!

Top-Down Arena Shooter. Multiplayer ONLY. 2 - 4 players (local). Gamepad required (xbox 360 controller or similar).

A game inspired by YoYo Games GameMaker Studio 2 BetaJam 2016! This game was created for the Beta Jam and we had a ton of fun making it. It was a rather rushed project to squeeze into the deadline at late notice, but we might revisit it and remake it proper with much more detail if feedback is good!

*This game was developed from scratch in GameMaker Studio 2 Beta

*Art assets were also developed in GameMaker Studio 2 Beta in order to give the program a thorough test.

*The programming and art development for this project were recorded in order to provide a timelapse video to show off the workflow and process while using GameMaker Studio 2. Video will be uploaded in the near future!

Game development by Sumofunk and studioBOMBSHELL with WanderingSumo.

wanderingsumo.com | studioBOMBSHELL.com

Background music credit to Erik Skiff: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Eric_Skiff/

Special notes:

* For testing purposes you can press "Y" (xbox 360 controller) or equivalent to your gamepad during character select to auto-select characters for all players and ready the game.

* Press Alt+Enter to full-screen the game.
